value:
$WmMEID_ネルトゥス,ch00_50_Nerthus_Normal,Face|The cycle is the source of the
power the golden serpents hold.$k$pKvasir turns into Seiðr, Seiðr turns
to Gullveig... These events, along with
the ritual, grants the serpents power.$k$pThen Gullveig becomes Kvasir and
returns to the past...$k$pKvasir turns into Seiðr, Seiðr turns
to Gullveig... Once again, the ritual
grants the serpents power.$k$pThe cycle repeats without end,
each time the power of the golden
serpents growing without limit.$k$p$WmMPID_セイズ,ch00_46_Seith_F_Normal,Face_Pain|...$k$p$WmMEID_ネルトゥス,ch00_50_Nerthus_Normal,Face|If we can recover my Aurr, we will be
able to access a power that should be
enough to stop the golden serpents.$k$pI will be able to use the power only
once—but that alone will not earn
us victory over the serpents.$k$pLike I said before, their power
is limitless.$k$p$WmMPID_セイズ,ch00_46_Seith_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Then...how can we hope to
defeat them?$k$p$WmMEID_ネルトゥス,ch00_50_Nerthus_Normal,Face|The key to our strategy will
be $Nu.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|...What is it exactly that you need
$Nu to do?$k$p$WmMEID_ネルトゥス,ch00_50_Nerthus_Normal,Face|Within the cycle, all things repeat
in an endless loop...$k$pThe cycle occurs over and over,
without end...$k$pNot even the summoner is beyond
the cycle of time. Each of us is
bound by it.$k$pHowever, as the god of the land,
my love for you adorable things has
allowed me to sense something...$k$pThe you here, in this moment...
There's something different about
you, $Nu.$k$pYou alone are the exception—of all
the uncountable summoners named
$Nu out there...$k$pWhy you? That, even I don't know...$k$pPerhaps you have some idea?$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|So, you'll do something to save us
then, right, $Nu?!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|But...if the power of the serpents
is truly limitless, then...how?$k$pWill we be able to cycle through
endless loops as well?$k$p$WmMEID_ネルトゥス,ch00_50_Nerthus_Normal,Face|That's exactly right. What a smart
little thing you are!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|How can we create an endlessly
repeating cycle?$k$p$WmMEID_ネルトゥス,ch00_50_Nerthus_Normal,Face|For the answer to that question,
you will have to look not to me,
but to the summoner.$k$p...That is, if this works.$k$pWe need to recover my Aurr before
anything else. Let's hurry now.$k$p$Sbs150|

$WmMPID_アリオーン,ch06_39_Arione_M_Normal,Face|Altena, you could not understand
Father as deeply as I.$k$p$Sbs1000|
